hook.text: You found bias. Now how do you remove it without breaking the model?

buildup.text: Pre-processing: rebalance the dataset. In-processing: add fairness constraints to loss.

discovery.text: Post-processing: adjust thresholds per group to equalize outcomes after training.

twist.text: Debiasing can reduce accuracy for the majority group. Stakeholders may resist.

punchline.text: Removing bias is an ongoing process, not a one-time fix.

quiz.question: What is a post-processing debiasing technique?
options: Adjusting thresholds per group after training
